subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[indulge]] oneself; to be [[profligate]]; to [[throw off]] [[restraint]]
#* {{zh-x|聖王 不作，諸侯 放恣，處{chǔ}士 橫{hèng}議。|Sage sovereigns cease to arise, the princes of the States '''give the reins to their lusts'''. Unemployed scholars indulge in unreasonable discussions.|ref=Mengzi}}
# to [[allow]] someone to [[do]] as they [[please]]
# [[wantonly]]; to one’s [[heart]]'s [[content]]
# to [[change]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[comfortable]]; [[cosy]]
